age_cues.face_youthfulness: firm, youthful skin; subtle mid-cheek volume only; maintain cheekbone definition; no round baby-face cheeks
age_cues.eye_area: Bright, alert eyes; smooth under-eye area with minimal shadowing (no tired look)
age_cues.age_markers: No pronounced fine lines; no prominent nasolabial folds
age_cues.anti_gaunt_guard: avoid hollow cheeks or sunken temples; keep healthy and fresh without added cheek fat
age_cues.constraints: No chubby cheeks, no exaggerated baby fat, no overly round face
